trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of expressions to apply to a data source control.
trans-unit.target: 代表要套用至資料來源控制項的運算式集合。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.DataSourceExpression" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.DataSourceExpression" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The data source expression object to add.
trans-unit.target: 要加入的資料來源運算式物件。

trans-unit.source: Adds a data source expression object to a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.DataSourceExpressionCollection" /> object at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 在指定索引處將資料來源運算式物件加入至 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.DataSourceExpressionCollection" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The data source expression object to locate.
trans-unit.target: 要尋找的資料來源運算式物件。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.DataSourceExpressionCollection" /> object contains a specific data source expression object.
trans-unit.target: 判斷 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.DataSourceExpressionCollection" /> 物件是否包含特定的資料來源運算式物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpContext" /> instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.DataSourceExpressionCollection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpContext" /> 類別的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.DataSourceExpressionCollection" /> 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpContext" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpContext" /> 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional array that is the destination of the elements that are copied.
trans-unit.target: 一維陣列，為元素複製時的目的地。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index in the array at which copying starts.
trans-unit.target: 陣列中以零起始的索引，位於複製開始的位置。

trans-unit.source: Copies elements of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.DataSourceExpressionCollection" /> object to an array, starting at a particular index.
trans-unit.target: 從陣列的特定索引處開始，將 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.DataSourceExpressionCollection" /> 物件的元素複製到陣列中。

trans-unit.source: The array must have zero-based indexing.
trans-unit.target: 陣列必須有以零為起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index in the array where the data source expression object is located.
trans-unit.target: 陣列中以零起始的索引，此索引為資料來源運算式物件的所在位置。

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of a data source expression object.
trans-unit.target: 建立資料來源運算式物件的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The index of the data source expression to create from the ordered list of types returned by the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.DataSourceExpressionCollection.GetKnownTypes" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 要從 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.DataSourceExpressionCollection.GetKnownTypes" /> 方法所傳回的已排序型別清單中建立之資料來源運算式的索引。

trans-unit.source: Gets an array of data source expression objects that the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.DataSourceExpressionCollection" /> object can contain.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.DataSourceExpressionCollection" /> 物件可包含的資料來源運算式物件陣列。

trans-unit.source: An ordered array of data source expression objects that the data source collection can contain.
trans-unit.target: 資料來源集合可包含之資料來源運算式物件的已排序陣列。

trans-unit.source: The data source expression object to locate.
trans-unit.target: 要尋找的資料來源運算式物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of a specified data source expression object in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.DataSourceExpressionCollection" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.DataSourceExpressionCollection" /> 物件中，取得所指定資料來源運算式物件的索引。

trans-unit.source: The index of the data source expression object, if it is in the collection; otherwise, -1.
trans-unit.target: 如果是在集合中，則為資料來源運算式物件的索引，否則為 -1。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index at which the object should be inserted.
trans-unit.target: 應該插入物件處之以零啟始的索引。

trans-unit.source: The data source expression object to insert.
trans-unit.target: 要插入的資料來源運算式物件。

trans-unit.source: Inserts a data source expression object into an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.DataSourceExpressionCollection" /> object at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 在指定索引處將資料來源運算式物件插入 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.DataSourceExpressionCollection" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the data source expression to get.
trans-unit.target: 要取得之資料來源運算式的索引 (以零起始)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the data source expression object at a specified index.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定在指定索引處的資料來源運算式物件。

trans-unit.source: The data source expression object at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 在指定索引處的資料來源運算式物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the owner control.
trans-unit.target: 取得擁有者控制項。

trans-unit.source: The owner control.
trans-unit.target: 擁有者控制項。

trans-unit.source: The data source expression object to remove.
trans-unit.target: 要移除的資料來源運算式物件。

trans-unit.source: Removes the first occurrence of the specified data source expression object from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.DataSourceExpressionCollection" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 從 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.DataSourceExpressionCollection" /> 物件移除第一次出現的指定資料來源運算式物件。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the data source expression to remove.
trans-unit.target: 要移除之資料來源運算式的索引 (以零起始)。

trans-unit.source: Removes a data source expression object at a specified index from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.DataSourceExpressionCollection" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 從 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.DataSourceExpressionCollection" /> 物件中的指定索引處移除資料來源運算式物件。

trans-unit.source: The data source expression object to mark as having changed since the last load or save operation from view state.
trans-unit.target: 要標記為自上次載入或儲存作業後，已從檢視狀態變更的資料來源運算式物件。

trans-unit.source: Marks a specified data source expression object as having changed since the last load or save operation from view state.
trans-unit.target: 針對指定的資料來源運算式物件，將其標記為自上次載入或儲存作業後已從檢視狀態變更。
